name: Einsamkeit: Dragon's Bane
description:
Mind fractured by unknown loss, Princess Catrin has no recollection of the tragedy that has befallen her kingdom. Throughout this ~20 minute game, you'll discover what happened to make her lose everything she held dear.

Submission for the 16th RPG Maker Horror Game Jam. This is our first ever project so constructive feedback and bug reports are always appreciated.

Credits

A game by Wizard Hut.

Tilesets:

Horror Tilesets by com_sho/コミュ将
Cauldron Sprite by Avy/Avery
Noble Interior by PandaMaru
Key Items by DantePixels

Plugins:

Disable Dash by Galv
Trigger Distance by Frogboy
